blocks.title: Tutorial on the Essential Climate Variable Surface Radiation Budget
blocks.description: The following tutorial describes the Essential Climate Variable “Surface Radiation Budget” and presents different surface radiation fluxes as well as their estimation methods from satellite observations. The related datasets are the CM SAF Cloud, Albedo and Radiation from the AVHRR data record, Edition 2 & E2.1 (CLARA-A2 & CLARA-A2.1) and the ESA Cloud_cci ATSR2-AATSRv3 dataset.
